BiblioEntry.Title: Danzer's configuration revisited
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Danzer's configuration revisited / Marko Boben, Gábor Gévay, Tomaž Pisanski

BiblioSet.Title: Advances in geometry
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Advances in geometry

BiblioEntry.Abstract: We revisit the configuration of Danzer ▫$DCD(4)$▫, a great inspiration for our work. This configuration of type ▫$(35_4)$▫ falls into an infinite series of geometric point-line configurations ▫$DCD(n)$▫. Each ▫$DCD(n)$▫ is characterized combinatorially by having the Kronecker cover over the Odd graph ▫$O_n$▫ as its Levi graph. Danzer's configuration is deeply rooted in Pascal's Hexagrammum Mysticum. Although the combinatorial configuration is highly symmetric, we conjecture that there are no geometric point-line realizations with 7- or 5-fold rotational symmetry; on the other hand, we found a point-circle realization having the symmetry group ▫$D_7$▫, the dihedral group of order 14.

BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Beiträge zur Algebra und Geometrie

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku obravnavamo obstoj ▫$g$▫-kotnikov v geometričnih in kombinatoričnih konfiguracijah. Pokažemo, da lahko znotraj posebne družine konfiguracij najdemo predstavnika za vsako izmed osmih možnosti obstoja ali neobstoja ▫$g$▫-kotnikov pri ▫$3 \le g \le 5$▫. Še več, pokažemo, da znotraj te družine obstajajo poljubno velike konfiguracije s to lastnostjo. Predstavimo tudi geometrijski realizaciji dveh najmanjših ▫$(v_3)$▫ konfiguracij brez trikotnikov, štirikotnikov in petkotnikov (posplošenih šestkotnikov). V primeru ▫$(v_4)$▫ konfiguracij predstavimo najmanjšo znano geometrijsko ▫$(v_4)$▫ konfiguracijo brez trikotnikov.

We investigate the existence of ▫$g$▫-laterals in geometric and combinatorial configurations. First we can show that within a special family of configurations any of the eight possible combinations of the existence or non-existence of ▫$g$▫-laterals for ▫$3 \le g \le 5$▫ may arise. Moreover, this is true for arbitrarily large configurations belonging to this family. We also present geometric realizations of the two smallest trilateral-, quadrilateral- and pentalateral-free ▫$(v_3)$▫ configurations (generalized hexagons). Finally, we consider ▫$(v_4)$▫ configurations and present the smallest-known geometric trilateral-free ▫$(v_4)$▫ configuration.

BiblioEntry.Title: Irreducible (v[sub]3) configurations and graphs
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Irreducible (v[sub]3) configurations and graphs / Marko Boben

BiblioSet.Title: Discrete Mathematics
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Discrete Mathematics

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Kubični dvodelni grafi z ožino vsaj 6 ustrezajo simetričnim kombinatoričnim ▫$(v_3)$▫ konfiguracijam. Leta 1887 je V. Martinetti opisal preprost postopek, s katerim lahko skonstruiramo vse kombinatorične ▫$(v_3)$▫ konfiguracije iz množice tako imenovanih ireducibilnih konfiguracij. Rezultat je bil od objave večkrat citiran, tako v zvezi s konfiguracijami, kot v zvezi z grafi. Toda izkaže se, da seznam ireducibilnih konfiguracij, ki ga je podal Martinetti, ni popoln. V članku so opisane vse ireducibilne konfiguracije in pripadajoči incidenčni grafi, vključno s tistimi, ki v Martinettijevem seznamu manjkajo.

Cubic bipartite graphs with girth at least 6 correspond to symmetric combinatorial ▫$(v_3)$▫ configurations. In 1887 V. Martinetti described a simple construction method which enables one to construct all combinatorial ▫$(v_3)$▫ configurations from a set of so-called irreducible configurations. The result has been cited several times since its publication, both in the sense of configurations and graphs. But after a careful examination, the list of irreducible configurations given by Martinetti has turned out to be incomplete. We will give the description of all irreducible configurations and corresponding graphs, including those whivh are missing in the Martinetti's list.

BiblioEntry.Title: Small triangle-free configurations of points and lines
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Small triangle-free configurations of points and lines / Marko Boben ... [et al.]

BiblioSet.Title: Discrete & computational geometry
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Discrete & computational geometry

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku pokažemo, da so za ▫$v \le 18$▫ vse konfiguracije brez trikotnikov geometrijsko realizabilne. Pokažemo tudi, da obstaja natanko ena najmanjša astralna ▫$(18_3)$▫ konfiguracija brez trikotnikov. Njen Levijev graf je posplošeni Petersenov graf ▫$G(18,5)$▫. Podani sta tudi geometrijski realizaciji edine praporno tranzitivne ▫$(20_3)$▫ konfiguracije brez trikotnikov ter edine točkovno tranzitivne ▫$(21_3)$▫ konfiguracije brez trikotnikov.

We show that all triangle-free configurations for ▫$v \le 18$▫ are geometrically realizable. We also show that there is a unique smalest astral ▫$(18_3)$▫ triangle free configuration and its Levi graph is the generalized Petersen graph ▫$G(18,5)$▫. In addition, we present geometric realizations of the unique flag transitive triangle-free configuration ▫$(20_3)$▫ and the unique point transitive triangle-free configuration ▫$21_3)$▫.

BiblioEntry.Title: I-graphs and the corresponding configurations
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: I-graphs and the corresponding configurations / Marko Boben, Tomaž Pisanski, Arjana Žitnik

BiblioSet.Title: Journal of combinatorial designs
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Journal of combinatorial designs

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Članek obravnava družino I-grafov, ki je poplošitev družine posplošenih Petersenovih grafov. Preučujemo različne lastnosti I-grafov kot so povezanost, dvodelnost, ožina, točkovna tranzitivnost. Predstavimo učinkovit test za ugotavljanje izomorfnosti dveh I-grafov samo iz njunih parametrov. Opišemo grupo avtomorfizmov I-grafa ▫$I(n,j,k)$▫. Dvodelni regularni grafi z ožino vsaj 6 so Levijevi grafi simetričnih kombinatoričnih konfiguracij. Obravnavamo konfiguracije, ki jih dobimo iz dvodelnih I-grafov. Izkaže se, da lahko nekatere med njimi realiziramo v ravnini kot ciklične astralne konfiguracije, t.j. geometrijske konfiguracije z največjo možno simetrijo v ravnini.

We consider the class of I-graphs ▫$I(n,j,k)$▫, which is a generalization over the class of generalized Petersen graphs. We study different properties of I-graphs such as connectedness, girth and whether they are bipartite or vertex-transitive. We give an efficient test for isomorphism of I-graphs and characterize the automorphism groups of I-graphs. Regular bipartite graphs with girth at least 6 can be considered as Levi graphs of some symmetric combinatorial configurations. We consider configurations that arise from bipartite I-graphs. Some of them can be realized in the plane as cyclic astral configurations, i.e. as geometric configurations with maximal isometric symmetry.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: mathematics /combinatorics /astral configurations /I-graphs /generalized Petersen graphs /group of automorphisms

BiblioEntry.Title: The 10-cages and derived configurations
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: The 10-cages and derived configurations / T. Pisanski ... [et al.]

BiblioSet.Title: Discrete Mathematics
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Discrete Mathematics

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Delo raziskuje simetrijo treh 10-kletk na 70 točkah. Vse tri so dvodelni grafi in zato Levijevi grafi ▫$(35_3)$▫ konfiguracij brez trikotnikov in štirikotnikov. Za vse grafe so določeni Hamiltonovi cikli s pripadajočo LCF notacijo ter redi grup avtomorfizmov (80, 120 in 24). Posebna pozornost je namenjena Balabanovi 10-kletki, prvi znani 10-kletki, ter pripadajoči Balabanovi konfiguraciji. Slednja je linearna, kar pomeni, da jo lahko realiziramo s točkami in premicami v evklidski ravnini. Na osnovi Balabanove konfiguracije je skonstruirana družina linearnih ▫$((7n)_3)$▫ konfiguracij brez trikotnikov in štirikotnikov za vsak lih ▫$n \ge 5$▫.

Symmetry properties of the three 10-cages on 70 vertices are investigated. Being bipartite, these graphs are Levi graphs of triangle-free and quadrangle-free ▫$(35_3)$▫ configurations. For each of this graphs a Hamilton cycle is given via the associated LCF notation. Furthermore, the automorphism groups of respective orders 80, 120, and 24 are computed. A special emphasis is given to the Balaban 10-cage, the first known example of a 10-cage, and the corresponding Balaban configuration. It is shown that the latter is linear, that is, it can be realized as a geometric configuration of points and lines in the Euclidean plane. Finally, based on the Balaban configuration, an infinite series of linear triangle-free and quadrangle-free ▫$((7n)_3)$▫ configurations is produced for each odd integer ▫$n \ge 5$▫.

BiblioEntry.Title: Algorithms for drawing polyhedra from 3-connected planar graphs
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Algorithms for drawing polyhedra from 3-connected planar graphs / Alen Orbanić ... [et al.]

BiblioSet.Title: Informatica
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Informatica
BiblioSet.Subtitle: an international journal of computing and informatics

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku sta predstavljena dva algoritma za izračun poliedrskih upodobitev danega 3-povezanega ravninskega grafa. Prvi upodablja Tuttejevo 2D risbo, ki jo dvignemo v 3D prostor in dobimo poliedrsko upodobitev. Drugi je preprost algoritem, ki ga je predlagal G. Hart. Namenjen je risanju kanoničnih poliedrskih upodobitev. Prikazani so tudi nekateri alternativni algoritmi za izračun Tuttejeve risbe (fizikalni model, verjetnostni model z markovskimi verigami). Dokazano je njihovo delovanje.

Two algorithms for producing polyhedral representations for 3-connected planar graphs are discussed in the paper. One of them uses Tutte's drawing algorithm to produce 2D drawing. Then the drawing is lifted into 3D space obtaining a polyhedral embedding. The other is simple algorithm by G. Hart for drawing canonical polyhedral representations. Some alternative aspects (physical model, Markov chain model) in algorithms for obtaining Tutte's drawings are presented and proved.

BiblioEntry.Title: Polycyclic configurations
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Polycyclic configurations / M. Boben, T. Pisanski

BiblioSet.Title: European journal of combinatorics
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: European journal of combinatorics

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Policiklične konfiguracije predstavljajo posplošitev cikličnih konfiguracij. Njihova struktura omogoča kratek zapis s pomočjo grafov. Posebna pozornost je namenjena policikličnim ▫$(v_k)$▫ konfiguracijam za ▫$k = 2,3,4$▫. V nekaterih primerih omogoča struktura policikličnih konfiguracij tudi lažji študij njihovih realizacij.

Polycyclic configurations constitute a generalization of the well-known class of cyclic configurations. They admit a concise description via voltage graphs over cyclic groups. Polycyclic ▫$(v_k)$▫ configurations are considered for ▫$k = 2,3,4$▫. The structure of polycyclic configuratios can be used in some cases to generate a rotational straight-line drawing of such configurations in the Euclidean plane.

BiblioEntry.Title: Erratum to "Reduction of symmetric configurations n [sub] 3" [Discrete Appl. Math. 99(1-3) (2000) 401 -411]
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Erratum to "Reduction of symmetric configurations n [sub] 3" [Discrete Appl. Math. 99(1-3) (2000) 401 -411] / Eckhard Steffen ... [et al.]

BiblioSet.Title: Discrete applied mathematics
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Discrete applied mathematics

BiblioEntry.Abstract: In [H.-G. Carstens, T. Dinski, E. Steffen, Reduction of symmetric configurations $▫n_3$▫, Discrete Appl. Math. 99 (2000) 401-411] the authors claim that there exist a finite number of reductions such that every connected bicubic graph with girth ▫$\ge 6$▫ different from the Fano-Heawood graph ▫$F$▫ can be reduced to a smaller of the same kind, having two vertices less, and by iteration to ▫$F$▫. In this note, we define an additional necessary reduction, which is not listed in [H.-G. Carstens, T. Dinski, E. Steffen, Reduction of symmetric configurations ▫$n_3$▫, Discrete Appl. Math. 99 (2000) 401-411].

BiblioEntry.Title: Visualization of graphs and related discrete structures in Mathematica
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Visualization of graphs and related discrete structures in Mathematica / Tomaž Pisanski, Marko Boben, Arjana Žitnik

BiblioSet.Title: Zbornik radova
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Zbornik radova / PrimMath[2001]

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Objekte v diskretni matematiki, kot so na primer grafi, grupe, poliedri, preslikave, delno urejene množice, mreže, tlakovanja, incidenčne strukture itd., je lažje preučevati, če jih lahko na nek način vizualiziramo. V programskem paketu VEGA, ki temelji na Mathematici, je narejenih veliko algoritmov za avtomatsko risanje objektov. Tukaj opisujemo nekaj postopkov za risanje grafov ter predstavitev objektov v Mathematici.

Research in discrete mathematics can be conducted more efficiently if one can visualize discrete structures such as graphs, groups, polyhedra, maps, posets, lattices, tilings, incidence structures etc. The Mathematica based computer package VEGA has many automatic drawing programs built in. We review several methods for drawing graphs and present a way of computer representation of other discrete structures which can be visualized as graphs.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Raziskovanje na področju diskretne matematike si lahko olajšamo z grafično predstavitvijo objektov kot so grafi, grupe, poliedri, zemljevidi, delno urejene množice, mreže, tlakovanja, incidenčne strukrure itd. Programski paket Vega, ki je zgrajen na osnovi Mathematice in ga naša skupina razvija že nekaj let, vsebuje več programov za predstavitev teh objektov. Članek daje pregled metod za predstavitev grafov, s katerimi lahko predstavimo tudi nekatere druge diskretne strukture. Pokazan je tudi primer, ki kaže, kako s pomočjo Vege postavljamo hipoteze in rešujemo probleme.

Research in discrete mathematics can be conducted more efficiently if one can visualize discrete structures such as graphs, groups, polyhedra, maps, posets, lattices, tilings, incidence structures, etc. The Mathematica based computer package VEGA that our group is developing over the years has many automatic drawing programs built in. We review several methods for drawing graphs and present a way of computer representation of other discrete structures which can be visualizated as graphs. The expert knowledge built in VEGA is intended for interactive work that usually helps formulating and solving research problems.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Predstavljamo posplošitev volilnega sistema QMV (Qualified Majority Voiting). Kot merilo moči volilca uporabljamo t.i. Banzhafov indeks. Predstavljamo algoritem, ki s pomočjo strategije sestopanja izračuna Banzhafov indeks. Algoritem uporabimo pri izračunu volilnih pragov ugodnih za Slovenijo.

A generalization of the Qualified Majority Voting (QMV) system is presented. As a measure of a power of a voter, so called normalized Banzhaf index is used. A backtracking type algorithm for calculating a normalized Banzhaf index is introduced. The practical use of the algorithm is presented on the case of calculation of the most favourable set of the QMV tresholds for a given country within European Union such as Slovenia.

BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Algorithms for drawing polyhedra from 3-connected planar graphs / Alen Orbanić ... [et al.]

BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Zbornik B 6. mednarodne multi-konference Informacijska družba IS 2003, 13. do 17. oktober 2003 / uredil[i] Vladislav Rajkovič ... [et al.]

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku sta predstavljena dva algoritma za izračun poliedrskih upodobitev danega 3-povezanega ravninskega grafa. Prvi upodablja Tuttejevo 2D risbo, ki jo dvignemo v 3D prostor in dobimo poliedrsko upodobitev. Drugi je preprost algoritem, ki ga je predlagal G. Hart. Namenjen je risanju kanoničnih poliedrskih upodobitev. Prikazani so tudi nekateri alternativni algoritmi za izračun Tuttejeve risbe (fizikalni model, verjetnostni model z markovskimi verigami). Dokazano je njihovo delovanje.

Two algorithms for producing polyhedral representations for 3-connected planar graphs are discussed in the paper. One of them uses Tutte's drawing algorithm to produce 2D drawing. Then the drawing is lifted into 3D space obtaining a polyhedral embedding. The other is simple algorithm by G. Hart for drawing canonical polyhedral representations. Some alternative aspects (physical model, Markov chain model) in algorithms for obtaining Tutte's drawings are presented and proved.

BiblioEntry.Title: Uporaba teorije grafov pri kombinatoričnih in geometričnih konfiguracijah : doktorska disertacija
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Uporaba teorije grafov pri kombinatoričnih in geometričnih konfiguracijah : doktorska disertacija / Marko Boben
BiblioEntry.Subtitle: doktorska disertacija

Notes.Dissertation: Univ. Ljubljana, Fakulteta za matematiko in fiziko, Oddelek za matematiko

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Incidenčna struktura je urejena trojica ▫$(P,\mathcal{B},I$▫, kjer sta ▫$P$▫ in ▫$\mathcal{B}$▫ disjunktni neprazni množici točk in blokov, ▫$I$▫ pa binarna relacija med ▫$P$▫ in ▫$\mathcal{B}$▫. Incidenčni strukturi pravimo kombinatorična ▫$(v_r,b_s$▫ konfiguracija, če ima ▫$v$▫ točk, ▫$b$▫ blokov, vsaka točka je vsebovana v ▫$r$▫ blokih, vsak blok vsebuje ▫$s$▫ točk in velja, da dva različna bloka vsebujeta kvečjemu eno skupno točko. V zvezi s konfiguracijami pogosto uporabljamo geometrijske izraze. Množica ▫$v$▫ točk in ▫$b$▫ premic v evklidski ravnini je geometrična ▫$(v_r,b_s)$▫ konfiguracija, če skozi vsako točko poteka ▫$r$▫ premic in vsaka premica vsebuje ▫$s$▫ točk. Konfiguracije, za katere velja ▫$v=b$▫ (in potem tudi ▫$r=s$▫), imenujemo simetrične konfiguracije. Oznako ▫$(v_r,v_r)$▫ poenostavimo v ▫$(v_r)$▫. Disertacija obravnava dve temi. Prva se navezuje na kombinatorične konfiguracije in grafe. Kombinatorične konfiguracije ustrezajo namreč dvodelnim polregularnim grafom z dolžino najkrajšega cikla vsaj 6. Imenujemo jih incidenčni ali Levijevi grafi. Druga tema obravnava problem predstavitve kombinatoričnih konfiguracij v evklidski ravnini. Pri povezavi kombinatoričnih konfiguracij in grafov je poudarek na induktivnem načinu konstrukcije simetričnih ▫$(v_3)$▫ konfiguracij. Vsaka kombinatorična ▫$(v_3)$▫ konfiguracija je bodisi ireducibilna ali pa jo lahko z danim postopkom skonstruiramo iz manjše konfiguracije. V delu so klasificirane vse ireducibilne konfiguracije, kar dopolnjuje nepopoln Martinettijev rezultat iz konca 19. stoletja. Opisane in raziskane so tudi kombinatorične konfiguracije, ki jih določajo nekatere posebne družine grafov, kot so npr. kletke (najmanjši kubični grafi z dano dolžino najkrajšega cikla), posplošeni Petersenovi grafi ter I-grafi. Problem predstavirve kombinatorične konfiguracije v ravnini je razdelan v luči dveh na novo vpeljanih pojmov, šibke in krepke realizacije, ter v njunem razmerju do geometričnih konfiguracij. Posebej zanimive so tiste kombinatorične konfiguracije, ki se dajo predstaviti v evklidski ravnini z določeno mero simetrije. Klasifikacija teh konfiguracij je narejena prek opisa njihovih Liejevih grafov kot krovnih grafov.

An incidence structure is an ordered triple ▫$(P,\mathcal{B},I$▫ where ▫$P$▫ and ▫$\mathcal{B}$▫ are disjoint non-empty sets of points and blocks, and ▫$I$▫ is a binary relation between ▫$P$▫ and ▫$\mathcal{B}$▫. A combinatorial ▫$(v_r,b_s$▫ is an incidence structure having ▫$v$▫ points and ▫$b$▫ blocks such that each point is contained in ▫$r$▫ blocks, each block contains ▫$s$▫ points, and two distincts blocks meet in at most one common point. With configurations geometric language is often used. A set of ▫$v$▫ points and ▫$b$▫ lines in the Euclidean plane is a geometric configuration if each point is incident with ▫$r$▫ lines and each line contains ▫$s$▫ points. Configurations for which ▫$v=b$▫ (and consequently, ▫$r=s$▫) are called symmetric. The notation ▫$(v_r,v_r)$▫ is simplified to ▫$(v_r)$▫. In the Thesis, two main topics are discussed. The first one is about combinatorial configurations and graphs. Namely, combinatorial configurations correspond to bipartite biregular graphs having girth at least 6, also called the respective incidence or Levi graphs. The second topic deals with the problem of representation of combinatorial configurations in the Euclidean plane. In studying combinatorial configurations in terms of the associated graphs the inductive method of constructing symmetric ▫$(v_3)$▫ configurations are considered. Namely, each combinatorial ▫$(v_3)$▫ configuration is either irreducible or it can be obtained from a smaller one. In the Thesis all irreducible configurations are classified. This correct the incomplete classification given by V. Martinetti more than one hundred years ago. Combinatorial configurations associated with certain families of graphs such as cages, the generalized Petersen graphs and the I-graphs, are described and analyzed. The representation problem is approached in the light of two newly introduced concepts, in the weak and strong realization, and via their connection to geometric configurations. Especially interesting are those combinatorial configurations which can be represented in the Euclidean plane with a certain degree of symmetry. A new concept of a polycyclic combinatorial configuration is introduced. The classification of such configurations is achieved by means of their Levi graphs as covering graphs.

Notes.Dissertation: Univ. Ljubljana, FMF Matematika, Raziskovalna smer

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Delo obravnava konfiguracije z več zornih kotov. V prvem poglavju na kratko obravnava grafe in incidenčne strukture: projektivne in afine ravnine ter načrte in Steinerjeve sisteme (navaja v glavnem definicije in klasične izreke s tega področja). K konfiguracijam preide v drugem poglavju: zgodovinski pregled snovi, problem obstoja konfiguracij, predstavitev nekaterih najmanjših konfiguracij npr. Fanove, Möbius-Kantorjeve, Desarguesove. Gre za preplet rezultatov iz teorije grafov in teorije načrtov, zlasti Steinerjevih sistemov in diferenčnih množic. Tretje poglavje obravnava reprezentacije konfiguracij. Osrednja pozornost je namenjena Steinitzevemu izreku, ki je najstarejši rezultat s tega področja. Podani so tudi novejši rezultati in algoritem za iskanje realizacij. V zadnjem poglavju so obravnavane posebne družine konfiguracij - policiklične konfiguracije. V dodatku so zbrane realizacije in kombinatorični opisi nekaterih manjših konfiguracij.

BiblioEntry.Title: Small triangle-free configurations of points and lines
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Small triangle-free configurations of points and lines / Marko Boben ... [et al.]

BiblioSet.Title: Preprint series
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Preprint series
BiblioSet.Keytitle: Prepr. ser. - Univ. Ljubl. Inst. Math.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: We show that all triangle-free configurations for ▫$v \le 18$▫ are geometrically realizable. We also show that there is a unique smalest astral ▫$(18_3)$▫ triangle free configuration and its Levi graph is the generalized Petersen graph ▫$G(18,5)$▫. In addition, we present geometric realizations of the unique flag transitive triangle-free configuration ▫$(20_3)$▫ and the unique point transitive triangle-free configuration ▫$21_3)$▫.

BiblioEntry.Title: I-graphs and the corresponding configurations
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: I-graphs and the corresponding configurations / Marko Boben, Tomaž Pisanski, Arjana Žitnik

BiblioSet.Title: Preprint series
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Preprint series
BiblioSet.Keytitle: Prepr. ser. - Univ. Ljubl. Inst. Math.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: We consider the class of I-graphs ▫$I(n,j,k)$▫, which is a generalization over the class of generalized Petersen graphs. We study different properties of I-graphs such as connectedness, girth and whether they are bipartite or vertex-transitive. We give an efficient test for isomorphism of I-graphs and characterize the automorphism groups of I-graphs. Regular bipartite graphs with girth at least 6 can be considered as Levi graphs of some symmetric combinatorial configurations. We consider configurations which arise from bipartite I-graphs. Some of them can be realized in the plane as cyclic astral configurations, i.e. as geometric configurations with maximal isometric symmetry.

BiblioEntry.Title: Algorithms for drawing polyhedra from 3-connected planar graphs
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Algorithms for drawing polyhedra from 3-connected planar graphs / Alen Orbanić ... [et al.]

BiblioSet.Title: Preprint series
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Preprint series
BiblioSet.Keytitle: Prepr. ser. - Univ. Ljubl. Inst. Math.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku sta predstavljena dva algoritma za izračun poliedrskih upodobitev danega 3-povezanega ravninskega grafa. Prvi upodablja Tuttejevo 2D risbo, ki jo dvignemo v 3D prostor in dobimo poliedrsko upodobitev. Drugi je preprost algoritem, ki ga je predlagal G. Hart. Namenjen je risanju kanoničnih poliedrskih upodobitev. Prikazani so tudi nekateri alternativni algoritmi za izračun Tuttejeve risbe (fizikalni model, verjetnostni model z markovskimi verigami). Dokazano je njihovo delovanje.

Two algorithms for producing polyhedral representations for 3-connected planar graphs are discussed in the paper. One of them uses Tutte's drawing algorithm to produce 2D drawing. Then the drawing is lifted into 3D space obtaining a polyhedral embedding. The other is simple algorithm by G. Hart for drawing canonical polyhedral representations. Some alternative aspects (physical model, Markov chain model) in algorithms for obtaining Tutte's drawings are presented and proved.

graph theory /Tutte's drawing /polyhedral representation /3D convex polyhedra /drawing polyhedra /canonical polyhedron

BiblioEntry.Title: Irreducible (v[sub]3) configurations and graphs
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Irreducible (v[sub]3) configurations and graphs / Marko Boben

BiblioSet.Title: Preprint series
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Preprint series
BiblioSet.Keytitle: Prepr. ser. - Univ. Ljubl. Inst. Math.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Kubični dvodelni grafi z ožino vsaj 6 ustrezajo simetričnim kombinatoričnim ▫$(v_3)$▫ konfiguracijam. Leta 1887 je V. Martinetti opisal preprost postopek, s katerim lahko skonstruiramo vse kombinatorične ▫$(v_3)$▫ konfiguracije iz množice tako imenovanih ireducibilnih konfiguracij. Rezultat je bil od objave večkrat citiran, tako v zvezi s konfiguracijami, kot v zvezi z grafi. Toda izkaže se, da seznam ireducibilnih konfiguracij, ki ga je podal Martinetti, ni popoln. V članku so opisane vse ireducibilne konfiguracije in pripadajoči incidenčni grafi, vključno s tistimi, ki v Martinettijevem seznamu manjkajo.

Cubic bipartite graphs with girth at least 6 correspond to symmetric combinatorial ▫$(v_3)$▫ configurations. In 1887 V. Martinetti described a simple construction method which enables one to construct all combinatorial ▫$(v_3)$▫ configurations from a set of so-called irreducible configurations. The result has been cited several times since its publication, both in the sense of configurations and graphs. But after a careful examination, the list of irreducible configurations given by Martinetti has turned out to be incomplete. We will give the description of all irreducible configurations and corresponding graphs, including those whivh are missing in the Martinetti's list.

BiblioEntry.Title: Interactive conjecturing with VEGA
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Interactive conjecturing with VEGA / Tomaž Pisanski, Marko Boben, Arjana Žitnik

BiblioSet.Title: Preprint series
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Preprint series
BiblioSet.Keytitle: Prepr. ser. - Univ. Ljubl. Inst. Math.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Raziskovanje na področju diskretne matematike si lahko olajšamo z grafično predstavitvijo objektov kot so grafi, grupe, poliedri, zemljevidi, delno urejene množice, mreže, tlakovanja, incidenčne strukrure itd. Programski paket Vega, ki je zgrajen na osnovi Mathematice in ga naša skupina razvija že nekaj let, vsebuje več programov za predstavitev teh objektov. Članek daje pregled metod za predstavitev grafov, s katerimi lahko predstavimo tudi nekatere druge diskretne strukture. Pokazan je tudi primer, ki kaže, kako s pomočjo Vege postavljamo hipoteze in rešujemo probleme.

Research in discrete mathematics can be conducted more efficiently if one can visualize discrete structures such as graphs, groups, polyhedra, maps, posets, lattices, tilings, incidence structures, etc. The Mathematica based computer package VEGA that our group is developing over the years has many automatic drawing programs built in. We review several methods for drawing graphs and present a way of computer representation of other discrete structures which can be visualizated as graphs. The expert knowledge built in VEGA is intended for interactive work that usually helps formulating and solving research problems.

mathematics /computer science /graph theory /Mathematica /graphs /representation /visualization /drawing methods /configurations /Balaban graph /Dyck graph /groups /Laplace matrix /Schlegel diagram /poset /knot

BiblioEntry.Title: Drawing methods for 3-connected planar graphs
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Drawing methods for 3-connected planar graphs / Alen Orbanić ... [et al.]

BiblioSet.Title: Preprint series
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Preprint series
BiblioSet.Keytitle: Prepr. ser. - Univ. Ljubl. Inst. Math.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Po Whitneyu ima vsak 3-povezan ravninski graf enolično vložitev na 2-sfero oziroma na ravnino. Tutte je pokazal, da je kombinatorična informacija o grafu zadostna za vložitev grafa v ravnino, tako da so slike povezav ravne daljice. Leta 1922 je Steinitz pokazal, da so 3-povezani ravninski grafi natanko 1-skeleti 3D poliedrov. To pomeni, da imamo poleg Whitneyeve topološke karakterizacije tudi 3D poliedrsko upodobitev takega grafa. Učinkovite Tuttove upodobitve na ravnini lahko dvignemo v 3D prostor do poliedrske upodobitve s pomočjo izreka o napetosti (Maxwella in Cremona). Pri določenih razredih grafov se je Laplaceova metoda za risanje grafov izkazala za dokaj primerno, vendar pri tej metodi nimamo zagotovila, da bi dobili poliedrsko upodobitev. Nedavno je bilo dokazano (Lovász in ostali), da lahko s pomočjo tako imenovane Colin de Verdiereove posplošitve Laplaceovih matrik dobimo poliedrske upodobitve 3-povezanih ravninskih grafov. V članku so pregledani algoritmični vidiki naštetih problemov. Algoritme za konstrukcijo poliedrskih upodobitev lahko uporabimo na številnih področjih v kristalografiji in kemiji.

According to Whitney, every 3-connected planar graph admits a unique embedding in the sphere or, equivalently, in the plane. Tutte showed that the combinatorial information is sufficient for providing a straight line planar embedding. In 1922 Steinitz proved that 3-connected planar graphs are exactly skeletons of convex 3D polyhedra. This means that the topological characterization of Whitney extends to 3D geometrical representation. Tutte's simple and efficient method can be lifted into 3D polyhedral drawing using methods involving Maxwell-Cremona stress theorem. The Laplace method for graph drawing proved to be suitable for 3D representations of some class of graphs. However, there are no guranties that the faces will be planar. Recently it was proved (Lowász et al.) that the so-called Colin de Verdière generalization of Laplace matrix could give very good polyhedral representations of 3-connected planar graphs. In this presentation algorithmic aspects of above approach to be problem of discussed. The algorithmic construction of convex polyhedron corresponding to planar 3-connected graphs has numerous applications in crystalography and chemistry.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: teorija grafov /3-povezani ravninski grafi /risanje grafov /iterativne metode /eksaktne metode /algoritmi /Steinitzove upodobitve /upodobitve grafov
graph theory /3-connected planar graphs /graph drawing /iterative methods /exact methods /algorithms /Steinitz representations /graph representations

BiblioEntry.Title: Pattern matching of colored point sets in 3D
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Pattern matching of colored point sets in 3D / Marko Boben ... [et al.]

BiblioSet.Title: Preprint series
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Preprint series
BiblioSet.Keytitle: Prepr. ser. - Univ. Ljubl. Inst. Math.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Obravnavamo naslednja problema: (1) Za dano množico točk ▫$S$▫ v 3D prostoru in manjšo množico točk ▫$P$▫, ki predstavlja vzorec točk, iščemo podmnožico ▫$P'$▫ iz ▫$S$▫, tako da lahko ▫$P'$▫ dobimo iz ▫$P$▫ z rotacijami, translacijami, zrcaljenji in množenjem s skalarjem. (2) Podobno kot (1), le da so točke še obarvane in pazimo še na ujemanje bo barvah. V članku so predstavljeni učinkoviti algoritmi za oba problema. Iz obeh problemov se da izpeljati množico poenostavljenih problemov s tem, da ne upoštevamo kake od transformacij. V članku opisani algoritmi se lahko uporabljajo pri popravljanju približne geometrije fullerenov in drugih kletk in s tem doseganje predpisane geometrije.

The following problems are considered: (1) Given a large collection of points ▫$S$▫ in 3D space and a small pattern set ▫$P$▫ find all occurrences of a subset ▫$P'$▫ in ▫$S$▫ such that ▫$P'$▫ is obtained from ▫$P$▫ as a result of rotation, translation, reflection, and scaling. (2) Same as (1), exept that points in both sets are labeled (colored).

BiblioEntry.Title: The generalized Balaban configurations
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: The generalized Balaban configurations / Tomaž Pisanski ... [et al.]

BiblioSet.Title: Preprint series
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Preprint series
BiblioSet.Keytitle: Prepr. ser. - Univ. Ljubl. Inst. Math.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Delo raziskuje simetrijo treh 10-kletk na 70 točkah. Vse tri so dvodelni grafi in zato Levijevi grafi ▫$(35_3)$▫ konfiguracij brez trikotnikov in štirikotnikov. Za vse grafe so določeni Hamiltonovi cikli s pripadajočo LCF notacijo ter redi grup avtomorfizmov (80, 120 in 24). Posebna pozornost je namenjena Balabanovi 10-kletki, prvi znani 10-kletki, ter pripadajoči Balabanovi konfiguraciji. Slednja je linearna, kar pomeni, da jo lahko realiziramo s točkami in premicami v evklidski ravnini. Na osnovi Balabanove konfiguracije je skonstruirana družina linearnih ▫$((7n)_3)$▫ konfiguracij brez trikotnikov in štirikotnikov za vsak lih ▫$n \ge 5$▫.

Symmetry properties of the three 10-cages on 70 vertices are investigated. Being bipartite, these graphs are Levi graphs of triangle-free and quadrangle-free ▫$(35_3)$▫ configurations. For each of this graphs a Hamilton cycle is given via the associated LCF notation. Furthermore, the automorphism groups of respective orders 80, 120, and 24 are computed. A special emphasis is given to the Balaban 10-cage, the first known example of a 10-cage, and the corresponding Balaban configuration. It is shown that the latter is linear, that is, it can be realized as a geometric configuration of points and lines in the Euclidean plane. Finally, based on the Balaban configuration, an infinite series of linear triangle-free and quadrangle-free ▫$((7n)_3)$▫ configurations is produced for each odd integer ▫$n \ge 5$▫.

BiblioEntry.Title: Polycyclic configurations
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Polycyclic configurations / Marko Boben, Tomaž Pisanski

BiblioSet.Title: Preprint series
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Preprint series
BiblioSet.Keytitle: Prepr. ser. - Univ. Ljubl. Inst. Math.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Policiklične konfiguracije predstavljajo posplošitev cikličnih konfiguracij. Njihova struktura omogoča kratek zapis s pomočjo grafov. Posebna pozornost je namenjena policikličnim ▫$(v_k)$▫ konfiguracijam za ▫$k = 2,3,4$▫. V nekaterih primerih omogoča struktura policikličnih konfiguracij tudi lažji študij njihovih realizacij.

Polycyclic configurations constitute a generalization of the well-known class of cyclic configurations. They admit a concise description via voltage graphs over cyclic groups. Polycyclic ▫$(v_k)$▫ configurations are considered for ▫$k = 2,3,4$▫. The structure of polycyclic configuratios can be used in some cases to generate a rotational straight-line drawing of such configurations in the Euclidean plane.

BiblioEntry.Title: Visualization of graphs and related discrete structures in Mathematica
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Visualization of graphs and related discrete structures in Mathematica / Tomaž Pisanski, Marko Boben, Arjana Žitnik

BiblioSet.Title: Preprint series
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Preprint series
BiblioSet.Keytitle: Prepr. ser. - Univ. Ljubl. Inst. Math.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Objekte v diskretni matematiki, kot so na primer grafi, grupe, poliedri, preslikave, delno urejene množice, mreže, tlakovanja, incidenčne strukture itd., je lažje preučevati, če jih lahko na nek način vizualiziramo. V programskem paketu VEGA, ki temelji na Mathematici, je narejenih veliko algoritmov za avtomatsko risanje objektov. Tukaj opisujemo nekaj postopkov za risanje grafov ter predstavitev objektov v Mathematici.

Research in discrete mathematics can be conducted more efficiently if one can visualize discrete structures such as graphs, groups, polyhedra, maps, posets, lattices, tilings, incidence structures etc. The Mathematica based computer package VEGA has many automatic drawing programs built in. We review several methods for drawing graphs and present a way of computer representation of other discrete structures which can be visualized as graphs.
